review_text: I started searching for a reversible window fan early, so that when the summer heat hits 99% I will be prepared. I had a Lasko reversible window fan that my sister gave me used, and that fan carried me thru some hot days for 6-7 years. I searched and found 3 fans and compared prices and wow-Amazon had the best price. I would recommend this fan to anyone who needs a great reversible window fan. I love it !
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
